title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2528.5 - Confidentiality
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2528.5 - Confidentiality

State Regulations

Registration information filed with the DHCR pursuant to
this Part shall not be subject to the Freedom of Information Law, provided that
such information relative to a tenant, owner, lessor or subtenant shall be made
available to such party or his or her authorized
representative. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2528.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
